MarketingInfo.element: AOC C27G2AE gaming monitor (C24G2AE/BK) navdušuje s svojo visoko ločljivostjo Full HD (1920 × 1080 px), ki zagotavlja izjemno kakovost slike, ostrino in prikazovanje tudi najmanjših podrobnosti. Klasično razmerje stranic slike 16:9 služi za maksimalen užitek v igranju iger, kot tudi za gledanje priljubljenih filmov. Opremite se z višjo hitrostjo osveževanja v primerjavi z drugimi monitorji in pozabite na sovražnike, ki se bliskovito premikajo po zaslonu, zaradi česar jih je težko doseči. S frekvenco osveževanja do 165 Hz boste na zaslonu videli te kritične manjkajoče slike in tako videli sovražnike, ki se premikajo izjemno gladko brez megljenja in prekinjanja. Zaradi bliskovito hitrega odzivnega časa 1 ms je monitor primeren tudi za igranje akcijskih/dirkalnih iger z visokim tempom.

MarketingInfo.element:
Full HD gaming monitor s tehnologijo zaslona VA in FreeSync Premium tehnologijo priznanega proizvajalca AOC z izjemno 165 Hz frekvenco osveževanja slike in neverjetnim odzivnim časom le 1 ms. Ponaša se z diagonalo zaslona 68,6 cm (27") in 350 cd/m2 svetilnostjo.

 
Za zvok poskrbita dva vgrajena 2 W zvočnika, po želji pa lahko na integriran 3,5 mm avdio priključek priklopite zunanje zvočnike ali slušalke. Povežete ga lahko na priključke HDMI in DisplayPort.
 
Za znatno zmanjšanje in omejitev utrujenosti oči poskrbita funkciji zmanjševanja modre svetlobe in brez utripanja (Flicker-free).

Product.ProductDescription: LOEWE TV 55'' Bild V, 4K Ultra, OLED HDR, Integrated soundbar

element.Name: Funkcije televizije
element.Value: Teletekst, EPG, Timeshift, Miracast, Hotel Mode, HLG (Hybrid Log Gamma), Dolby Vision, HDMI - ARC (Audio Return Channel)

MarketingInfo.element:
Loewe bild v
Fascinatingly different.
 
 
Loewe bild v

Experience a world where elegance, tradition and performance come together in perfect harmony and discover the extraordinary TV models in the bild v line from Loewe.

The latest technology and a 4K OLED panel with HDR10, HLG and Dolby Vision™ ensure maximum comfort. As you would expect from Loewe, each set is individually calibrated and optimised for perfect viewing pleasure before delivery.

The soundbar with six drivers provides 80 watts of total music output and, with its basalt coloured fabric cover, blends perfectly into the living environment.
German engineering with a great love of detail - for fascinating TV moments. 
 
 

OLED Technology.

The OLED technology stands for bright and natural colours, for perfect contrast - from deepest black to pure white - and for detailed sharpness even in very fast movements. In addition to impressive black and the finest nuances in dark parts of the picture, the OLED technology of the Loewe bild v enables brilliant colour reproduction. This is because against a pitch-black background, colours appear particularly bright and vivid. This makes the screens ideal for HDR films and content with Dolby Vision, which contain more and finer graded colours and a wider range of brightness.
 
 
 
 
Sound experience.

The powerful stereo sound system with closed bass reflex box and six integrated drivers generates 80 watts of voluminous total music power. In addition, the soundbar provides warm bass tones and fills the room with rich sound. The intelligent technology Mimi Defined™ recognises the optimum for the ears. Sound and tone are analysed in real time and the sound of the TV is adjusted to your personal hearing profile.
 
55"

Product.ProductDescription: LOEWE TV 55'' Iconic I dr+ (Bild i.55 dr+ / Klang bar3 mr / Floor stand + Accessory box Iconic), Graphite grey

MarketingInfo.element:
Loewe iconic
The perfectly symbiosis of design and technology
 
 
Loewe iconic

Transform your living room into an art gallery. The sculptural design of Loewe iconic combines the latest OLED technology with a room-filling sound experience and an extraordinary setup solution made of stone. This way your home becomes more than just a room to live in: It becomes a place where you can indulge in art, craftsmanship and culture - with the Loewe iconic as a powerfully designed, central design statement from our exclusive Loewe manufacturing facility at our head quarter in Kronach, Germany.
 
 
 
Everything but ordinary.

With its sculptural, coherent design language, the Loewe iconic merges into a unique symbiosis of television and soundbar. Made of Syno-Stone, it transforms your home into more than just a room to live in: It becomes a place where you can indulge in art, craft and culture.
 

State-of-the-art TV technology.

High-contrast images and an impressive colour spectrum: thanks to ultra-high-resolution 4K OLED, HLG, HDRIO and Dolby VisionTM, you can enjoy perfect home cinema with the Loewe iconic.65 and Loewe iconic.55 TV models in the SL5 and SL7 variants, which are already calibrated ex works.
 
 
 
 

Excellent audio technology.

The integrated 3.1 soundbar with three front-firing speakers and two built-in subwoofers delivers a total music output of 360 watts for a room-filling, natural and impressive sound experience - including Dolby Virtual Atmos, DTS X, Multiroom via Play-Fi, WDAL 2.0 and AVR connections.
 

Record - Take away.

With the DR+ built-in hard drive, you can record for hours. With a storage capacity of 1TB, your Loewe iconic will be right on schedule: You can record two programmes at the same time and watch TV on another channel. The TV programme can be paused and continued at a later time with a time delay. With the Loewe app, it is also possible to watch the programme on your mobile device while you are on the move.
